name: Gloop!
overview: Izzy and friends have stumbled across an old warehouse on the edge of town. To their horror they discover that inside are a group of console owners and other mutants intent on taking over the world. Izzy goes inside to put a stop to their evil plans, while his friends stay outside to fire energy giving sweets through the sklyights in the roof. Izzy has just one hour to save the day... Written by Cauldwell in 1994 during the dying days of the Spectrum's commercial life, Gloop! was re-released commercially by Cronosoft in 2003 as one of the company's first releases.
